alert.note: Alert for Bucks; Delaware; Montgomery; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 12:29PM EDT until June 16 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN HUNTERDON...NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...SOUTHWESTERN MERCER... NORTHWESTERN BURLINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY...SOUTHEASTERN BUCKS...PHILADELPHIA AND EAST CENTRAL DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 1228 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pipersville to near Feasterville to Westville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Philadelphia, Trenton, Camden, Bensalem, Ewing, Willingboro, Florence, Yeadon, Burlington, Bristol, Doylestown, Riverside, Palmyra, Hatboro, Folcroft, Jenkintown, Chalfont, East Lansdowne, Beverly and Rockledge. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike exit 5 and near exit 6A. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 339 and 359. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 19 and 40. Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 338 and 350. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 39 and 50, and between mile markers 75 and 76. Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 676 in New Jersey between mile markers 2 and 4. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
